ygData.subject: Re: Fortuneteller arrives (Windlord-> Megatron)
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC:  I don t know about you re faction, I m not on the Council.  As for going up to Unicron, it would not be very feasible.  They need to blast INTO Unicron,

OOC:  I don't know about you're faction, I'm not on the Council.  As for going up to Unicron, it would not be very feasible.  They need to blast INTO Unicron, FIND Malice, and BLAST out and return to the planet safely.  All things they can't really do right now.
 
IC:
Megatron Revived:
 
"Perhaps you would like to show me an opening not guarded and a time where he is not defended.  We should wait and have him brought to us.  Much easier, and besides, they will want to show off their newest toy anyway." the clone said, drawing on memory and the Matrix.  He replaced the artifact back into it's place and his chest closed.
"Though I might have the raw power to blast in, there are too many unknowns to go blindly forward."

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
"If you want to stop Unicron, why don't you just take
the slagging Matrix to him, and open it like Optimus
Prime did?"  She had no idea why she was suggesting
that two such sources of Destiny energy wipe each
other out, but she doubted the Decepticon would have
simply be oblivious to the option.

OOC: Has the council begun discussion on the Deviner's
limitations, or is it just a big topic of debate

--- robert riley <bustercross365@...> wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> "No, there is no 'divided' Matrix.  Most Decepticons
> and appearently Pedacons assume leadership through
> force and brutality.  Just as the Autobot Matrix
> allowed Optimus Prime to give life to the Dinobots
> and others, the Decepticon Matrix allows me to do
> the same.  I have spent time working with my Matrix,
> and developed the ability to read any Decepticon's
> spark."
> A series of locks unlatched and Megatron Revived
> pulled the Matrix out.  The gold, ornate housing
> held inside a pulsating red crystal, the actual
> Matrix.  The clone held it firmly in his hands, so
> no one could take it, if they were dumb enough to
> try.
> "This is THE Decepticon Matrix of Leadership."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> "Or both has adivided MAtrix"said Windlord 
>

> <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:

> >  
> > The emperor clone stood, and his three part chest
> panel opened.  
> Another cover opens and reveals the golden Matrix
> housing.

> convincing fake."
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:

> >

> the question
> > > > > > to her bolts and thew them down on the

> > > > > > see you have a great power, it is the
> shadow of the
> > > > > > light that was your undoing...oh, and yes,
> I believe I
> > > > > > see something about Malice, but it's
> vague, allow me a
> > > > > > moment."

> > > > > > OOC: Sorry, I thought I sent it to the
> group. Anyway,
> > > > > > how is Malice?
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness,
> Devouring"
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > Megatron Revived:
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > "Then... Do you know if Malice is okay?
> Tell me,
> > > > > > > will Malice return 
> > > > > > > to us?" the clone demanded.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > >
